casebody.data:
Angel NIEVES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 25, 2017

Vishal K. Garg and Damon A. R. Kirschbaum, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Angel Nieves' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 587, 152 A.3d 587 (2016), is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
